body.name: SEHMUA 2K Solar Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, 2 Pack 360° View Pan/Tilt WiFi Security Camera Outside with Color Night Vision,Easy to Install, PIR Alarm, 2-Way Audio, Cloud/SD Storage
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 32 mins
features: Solar-Powered & Panoramic View Camera: With a removable solar panel and its rechargeable battery, experience always on solar camera security outdoor. Control solar security camera pan & tilt to view your world from every angle. The non-stop power supply and full coverage view design give you 365-day protection and ensure your home's safety.

2K Full HD & Stunning Night Vision: Capture every event that occurs around your home in ultra-clear 2K resolution. The powerful white spotlight and built-in infrared LED array can help you capture colorful pictures and videos at dark, see any corner you want to monitor, let you sleep peacefully.

Effortless Installation & Setup: Experience the convenience of a 5-minute installation with its compact size and versatile installation design.Mount on a wall or attach it to the ceiling, installs it whichever way best fits your needs.

PIR Sensing & 2-Way Audio: Adopt more sensitive PIR motion sensor, support smart human detection to reduce false alarms and instant alerts. Also, the wireless camera outdoor supports two-way talk function and remote access, allowing you to have a conversation between you and your visitor.

Flexible Storage & Waterproof Design: This security cameras wireless outdoor is built-in SD slot for storage( up to 128GB, not included), and offers optional cloud storage (30-day trial), always safe and easily accessible. The outdoor camera is made of enhanced IP65 material, it never quits no matter in heavy rain/snow or extreme sun.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 139 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 2.4Ghz WiFi 2 Spotlight & Siren Alarm 3 Ready for All Weather

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to setup
reviews.reviewText: I have several cameras around my home but this one has to be the easiest to setup. I had the app downloaded and the camera connected in less than 5 minutes. You simply download an app, scan the qr code and you are in business. The solar charger works great even in late afternoon winter sun. The photo was taken before I mounted it so the screen is the reason it isn't as clear but even through a window screen the quality is very good. The motion alerts come through quickly to my phone and I would not hesitate to replace my garage camera of 2 years with this model. These cameras are great to keep an eye on my house while I'm at work and make sure our pets are cared for while on vacation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than a camera
reviews.reviewText: The best camera for the price. Easy setup. Impressive picture quality. Clear night vision. I like the sound. Will order some as gifts for friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price!
reviews.reviewText: We actually ordered six of these security cameras and my husband has installed them all in a weekend on the exterior corners of our home . So far, we are pleased with the results. Day and night vision is decent. In fact, night time vision was decent, as anything with a form of heat/body heat showed up in white. For example, someone walked up to our front door steps in a black jacked and the jacket detailed in white on the phone, so easier to note someone in the dark. What was a surprise, is there is a microphone within the camera, so you can speak to someone outside through your phone. Quality of cameras are excellent, installation was not difficult. Would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality camera
reviews.reviewText: 180 degree motion, motion sensor works well, sharp image, nice night vision

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can't beat them for the price ! 5 stars !!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Only thing is and the directions book tells you , that you may need to buy a wifi extender . If cable company never controled your wifi ,the one out in the center of the garage works good, but the front porch one is futher away and it won't turn because the wifi is to far away and need a extender which the book that comes with them tells you this .Picture and even has a alarm that sounds like a sirfen when you get out of the car under the carport. Plus they will zoom in and out . Easy to install and with the 128 gb minisd cards you don't have to buy the cloud is nice ,but its another monthy payment and u got plenty of time gb to keep the video if a robber does break in ,and once a month just tap settings and reformat the sd card and u got 128 more space for videos . For the price I'll give them a 5 review . One more thing to keep in mine, is how far away you want to install ,u will need a wifi extender for them to move up& down and left and right . Pretty neat to be setting in the recliner and you can turn it to the left or right and zoom in and see the neighbors setting on their porch and across the street .And the cameras are quiet,u can't hear them turn and u can turn the indicater light on or off and u can set 7 days a week and what time u want to record . So easy to set up ,and give you the patterns to drill for the screw s go . 5 thumbs up for the sehmua pan tilt security camera battery/solar powered .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent camera coverage and picture resolution. Easy to install cameras. The app is well designed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for distance and detection
reviews.reviewText: The distance for the camera to receive and send data from the router was well over 150 ft and still able to stream on your cellular device. Also, the detection of movement is really sensitive to get any movement near and far to the camera. Works Good in all types of weather!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We ordered another brand and we're not happy with them. Returned them. So far, these cameras are awesome! Easy and fast to install, picks up sound and records from the end of my driveway to the house. My 2nd camera records my lawn, super!!! You can move the angles of the camera from your phone app, select areas to exclude, way more options that customize where you want to see. Highly recommend!
